heading: HB02758
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING BANKS FROM IMPOSING SERVICE CHARGES OR ANY OTHER FEES ON SAVINGS OR CURRENT ACCOUNTS FOR FAILING TO COMPLY WITH THE BANK'S REQUIRED MINIMUM MAINTAINING BALANCE AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
